item.title: Practical Reverse Engineering Exercise Solutions: LiveKd / WinDbg Cheat Sheet
item.author: Author
item.description: Here are a couple of commands I regularly use for reverse engineering: uf <function>: Unassemble function dt nt!_ktss: Show the definition of the data structure _ktss ?? sizeof(_ktss): Show the size the data structure _ktss occupies in memory .hh uf: Show help for the function uf x nt!*createfile*: Search all functions having the string createfile in its name !vtop <PDPT-pointer> <virtualAddress>: Compute physical address of given virtual address and the pointer to the page directory pointer table
